name: Finger Physics: Finger Fun
description:
MOAR FREE Levels!

Finger Physics is the chart-topping finger lovin' phenomenon that has swept the App Store!

- Downloaded more than 5 million times!
- Loved by fingers everywhere!
- Continuous updates for free!

****

Finger Physics has been the #1 TOP PAID Puzzle Game in the US, UK, Germany and more!

****

“Finger Physics is AWESOME.” Eros Resmini, VP Openfeint

“This game is GREAT!!!!! Love it!!!!!” one of the 2000+ 5 Star User Reviews

“Bottom Line: Finger Physics is world-class game at a bargain price.” James Savage, Macworld.com

****

So what is Finger Physics?
It’s 28 Stages and 252 (my good god) levels of finger puzzling amazingness. It’s a word, trust us.

Features:

- 252 Levels with more added all the time (up from 81 at the initial launch)
- 7 game modes including tons of Egg levels – everyone’s favorite
- Exploding blocks
- Magnetized circles, squares and triangles
- Shapes that float and shapes that don’t
- Also starring Doodle the Doodler as himself!

You know what the best part of Finger Physics is? The updates with more levels! In the last 12 months Finger Physics has been updated 9 TIMES with 14 additional stages and 127 levels!

The price stays the same, but the levels keep coming. Sing it with me, who else loves you like PressOK does? NO ONE!!!

Get Finger Physics today and keep it at the top of the charts where it belongs! We promise to keep the levels coming as long as you keep downloading and telling your friends.

Check out our other games too (we Pinky swear they are awesome): Gin Rummy Multipack, Spinzizzle, and Flipstones.

More stuff:

Follow us on Twitter @press_ok (www.twitter.com/press_ok)
Become a fan of PressOK on Facebook @ www.facebook.com/pressokentertainment
